front.title: BGP Encodings and Procedures for Multicast in MPLS/BGP IP VPNs

abstract.t: RFC 6514 describes the BGP encodings and procedures for exchanging the information elements required by Multicast in MPLS/BGP IP VPNs, as specified in RFC 6513. This document updates and obsoletes RFC 6514. The original authors of RFC 6514 are listed at the end of this document.
